channel.title: {TUT} How to make a Calculator. [Begginer]{TUT}
channel.description:
Hi i recently made a tut called "how to make a powerminer" but the problem was it baarely got any veiws so i noticed that many people on this forum may not play rs2 so im making a tut on "How to make a Calculator". This tut is for begginers.
[size=10pt][b]##########Chapter 1##########[/b][/size]
First you must open up Scar you should see this. [code] Program New; Begin End.[/code]
Start by spacing it out a little then below [code]Program New;[/code] add this [code]Const[/code] A const is something that you tell the script to remember so instead of saying the same color or number 50+ times you could name it I in the const or X or anything else and the Script would remember it. So below [code]Const[/code] Type
[code]Number1=;//Write your first number here Number2=;//Write your second number here[/code] See how i have [code]//[/code] before [code]Write your first number here[/code] and the same with the second ? I do that because its like a note to the person reading the script or other scripters you could also have[code] {Write your first number here}[/code]Now we have to tell the user to choose what they are doing so if they want to choose multiply they would have to put a * in between the const we are going to add. Type [code]TheSum = '';//For addition put + for subtraction put - for multiplication put * and for division put /[/code] now the user knows what to do, add this below Number2
[size=10pt][b]##########Chapter 2##########[/b][/size]
Your script should now look something like this: [code]program New; Const Number1= ;//Write your first number here Number2= ;//Write your second number here TheSum = '' ;//For addition put + for subtraction put - for multiplication put * and for division put / begin
end.[/code] Now the script remembers Number1, Number2 and TheSum but it does nothing with them so before begin we are going to add a "procedure" Which basicly tells SCAR what to do. Write [code]Procedure Answer;[/code] i have named my procedure "Answer" but you can call it anything you want. Below [code]Procedure Answer;[/code] we will tell the script that its the begining of the procedure by adding in [code]Begin[/code]
Now we are going to tell the script that [b]if[/b] the user selects + [b]then[/b] add them together and give the user the answer in the debug box..... to do that we must write
[code]If TheSum = '+' then begin Writeln('Your Answer is : ' + IntToStr (Number1 + Number2); end;[/code] Writeln is a command that writes something in the debug box of scar.See how end has a semicolon thats because its the end of that bart not of the script. Now we are going to do the same thing exept not another procedure we can just write this after [code]end;[/code] write [code]If TheSum = '-' then begin Writeln('Your Answer is : ' + IntToStr (Number1 - Number2)[/code]do the same for multiplication and division only changing the + ,-, / and *.once you have done that the script should look something like this:[code]program New; Const Number1= 25;//Write your first number here Number2= 25;//Write your second number here TheSum = '+' ;//For addition put + for subtraction put - for multiplication put * and for division put / procedure Answer; begin if TheSum = '+' then begin Writeln('Your Answer is : ' + IntToStr(Number1 + Number2)); end; if TheSum = '-' then begin Writeln('Your Answer is : ' + IntToStr(Number1 - Number2)); end; if TheSum = '/' then begin Writeln('Your Answer is : ' + IntToStr(Number1 / Number2)); end; if TheSum = '*' then begin Writeln('Your Answer is : ' + IntToStr(Number1 * Number2)); end; end; begin
end.[/code]
[size=10pt][b]##########Chapter 3##########[/b][/size] You are now very close to finishing your calculator all you need to do is add something called the [b][i]Main Loop[/i][/b] the main loop is what scar follows so you have to add your procedure in there for scar to do it. In Between [code]begin
end.[/code] type the following [code] ClearDebug; Answer;[/code]
ClearDebug; clears the dubug box of scar.
And Answer; is the name of my procedure finnaly your script should look like this: [code]program New; Const Number1= 25;//Write your first number here Number2= 25;//Write your second number here TheSum = '+' ;//For addition put + for subtraction put - for multiplication put * and for division put / procedure Answer; begin if TheSum = '+' then begin Writeln('Your Answer is : ' + IntToStr(Number1 + Number2)); end; if TheSum = '-' then begin Writeln('Your Answer is : ' + IntToStr(Number1 - Number2)); end; if TheSum = '/' then begin Writeln('Your Answer is : ' + IntToStr(Number1 / Number2)); end; if TheSum = '*' then begin Writeln('Your Answer is : ' + IntToStr(Number1 * Number2)); end; end; begin ClearDebug; Answer; end.[/code]
I hope you liked this tut and that it helped you learn a bit more about scar I may make another tut which will be a bit harder so look out for it.
